title: Textile, ca. 1835
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant for purple
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 40 x 58.5 cm (15 3/4 x 23 1/16 in.)
description: Fragment of a pattern less than full repeat which would have filled the full width of the fabric: offset scenes of family life enclosed in a frame of leaves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1835.
ca. 1835. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant for purple. Gift of L'Antiquaire, Inc.. 1976-30-4.
